text: The Hoops This might refer to any of the following: *Shamrock Rovers F.C., an Irish association football team *Queens Park Rangers F.C., an English association football team *FC Dallas, a United States-based soccer team that play in Major League Soccer (MLS) *Hoops (band), an American indie pop band active from 2015 to 2018 ==See also== * Hoop (disambiguation), including uses of "Hoops"
title: The Hoops
